title.narrative: Malaria Action Program for the States (MAPS)

description.narrative: (Nigeria): -The Malaria Action Program for States (MAPS) project works at the state level to reduce the burden of malaria and contribute to the reduction of infant, child, and maternal mortalities. It works in nine of Nigeria's 36 states. -Major activities include:
